entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: N 14 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
